body.en:
{greeting}

Sorry, something went wrong while processing your email. Please try again in a few minutes.

If this keeps happening, let us know at {feedbackEmail}.

— aInbox
body.zh:
{greeting}

抱歉，处理您的邮件时出现了问题。请稍后重试。

如果问题持续出现，请联系 {feedbackEmail}。

— aInbox
